channel.title: Jean-Christophe Morin on jcmorin.dev
channel.description: Recent content in Jean-Christophe Morin on jcmorin.dev

item.title: Shorts
item.description: ??? … WT* … ??? Indeed, this is pretty much the reaction of almost everybody when they see me… You: Just… Why? Which I would usually answer with: Why not? And then you would look at me thinking I’m kind of weird. Now, if I don’t explain in more details why, you might: move on and just erase that moment from your memory. stare at me until I give more details.
